page.title: 13LOCAL NEWS OVER 100 YEARS(1)
page.content:
100 YEARS AGO (1885): JAN.24th.IN ARBORFIELD:DEATH OF LADY ALICIA CONROY-DIED FROM A CHILL. MAY 30th.JAMES STACEY SUMMONED FOR KEEPING A DOG WITHOUT A LICENCE. JUNE 20th.LIBERAL MEETING AT SHINFIELD. JUNE 27th.GEORGE JONES ASSAULTED THOMAS BABBARD AT SHINFIELD. JULY 4th.FATAL ACCIDENT IN THE HAYFIELD AT SHINFIELD.JOHN SPENCER FELL FROM A CART OF HAY.HE FELL ON HIS HEAD AND DIED INSTANTLY.
75 YEARS AGO (1910): JAN. 11th.ISAAC WHEELER,A LABOURER OF BURGHFIELD,WAS SUMMONED FOR ASSAULTING GEORGE MILES OF GREAT LEA,SHINFIELD.HE DID NOT APPEAR. APRIL 19th.THE NEW COUNCIL SCHOOL PROVIDED BY BERKSHIRE COUNCIL WAS OPENED TODAY.81 CHILDREN ADMITTED.
